title: tcksift
description:
Filter a whole-brain fibre-tracking data set such that the streamline densities match the FOD lobe integrals.



References:

Smith, R. E.; Tournier, J.-D.; Calamante, F. & Connelly, A. SIFT: Spherical-deconvolution informed filtering of tractograms. NeuroImage, 2013, 67, 298-312

nofilter.title: nofilter
nofilter.description: do NOT perform track filtering - just construct the model in order to provide output debugging images

output_at_counts.title: output_at_counts
output_at_counts.description: output filtered track files (and optionally debugging images if -output_debug is specified) at specific numbers of remaining streamlines; provide as comma-separated list of integers

proc_mask.title: proc_mask
proc_mask.description: provide an image containing the processing mask weights for the model; image spatial dimensions must match the fixel image

act.title: act
act.description: use an ACT five-tissue-type segmented anatomical image to derive the processing mask

fd_scale_gm.title: fd_scale_gm
fd_scale_gm.description: provide this option (in conjunction with -act) to heuristically downsize the fibre density estimates based on the presence of GM in the voxel. This can assist in reducing tissue interface effects when using a single-tissue deconvolution algorithm

no_dilate_lut.title: no_dilate_lut
no_dilate_lut.description: do NOT dilate FOD lobe lookup tables; only map streamlines to FOD lobes if the precise tangent lies within the angular spread of that lobe

make_null_lobes.title: make_null_lobes
make_null_lobes.description: add an additional FOD lobe to each voxel, with zero integral, that covers all directions with zero / negative FOD amplitudes

remove_untracked.title: remove_untracked
remove_untracked.description: remove FOD lobes that do not have any streamline density attributed to them; this improves filtering slightly, at the expense of longer computation time (and you can no longer do quantitative comparisons between reconstructions if this is enabled)

fd_thresh.title: fd_thresh
fd_thresh.description: fibre density threshold; exclude an FOD lobe from filtering processing if its integral is less than this amount (streamlines will still be mapped to it, but it will not contribute to the cost function or the filtering)

csv.title: csv
csv.description: output statistics of execution per iteration to a .csv file

out_mu.title: out_mu
out_mu.description: output the final value of SIFT proportionality coefficient mu to a text file

output_debug.title: output_debug
output_debug.description: provide various output images for assessing & debugging performance etc.

out_selection.title: out_selection
out_selection.description: output a text file containing the binary selection of streamlines

term_number.title: term_number
term_number.description: number of streamlines - continue filtering until this number of streamlines remain

term_ratio.title: term_ratio
term_ratio.description:
termination ratio - defined as the ratio between reduction in cost function, and reduction in density of streamlines.
Smaller values result in more streamlines being filtered out.

term_mu.title: term_mu
term_mu.description: terminate filtering once the SIFT proportionality coefficient reaches a given value

quiet.title: quiet
quiet.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

force.title: force
force.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

nthreads.title: nthreads
nthreads.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

key.title: key
key.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

value.title: value
value.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

items.title: config
items.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

config.title: config
config.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

help.title: help
help.description: display this information page and exit.

in_fod.title: in_fod
in_fod.description: input image containing the spherical harmonics of the fibre orientation distributions
